summary: The 'Protecting Veterans in Crisis Act' aims to enhance oversight and improve the Veterans Crisis Line. It mandates the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to notify congressional committees before terminating Veterans Crisis Line employees, providing justification, employee status, and a continuity plan. The bill also requires the Secretary to submit reports detailing staffing, performance, and operations of the Veterans Crisis Line, along with a Comptroller General report on recommendations for improvement. The sunset date is January 20, 2029.
